list.abs: megapixels 万像素, megapod 大脚的, megaplankton 巨型浮游生物

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin Megapodius (genus name), from mega- 'large' + Greek pous, pod- 'foot'

means.word_mean: 1. large-footed short-winged birds of Australasia; build mounds of decaying vegetation to incubate eggs

auth_sentence.content: The Nicobar megapode was found to be the most favoured targets of these airguns.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Nicobar megapode was found to be the most favoured targets of these airguns.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Nicobar megapode was found to be the most favoured targets of these airguns.
